## R Environment Information

This page demonstrates R analysis capabilities on Windows ARM.

```{r}
# Display R version and platform information
R.version$platform
R.version$version.string
```

## Basic Data Analysis

```{r}
# Create sample dataset
data <- data.frame(
  category = rep(c("A", "B", "C", "D"), each = 25),
  value = c(
    rnorm(25, mean = 10, sd = 2),
    rnorm(25, mean = 15, sd = 3),
    rnorm(25, mean = 12, sd = 2.5),
    rnorm(25, mean = 18, sd = 4)
  )
)

# Summary statistics
summary(data)
```

## Aggregated Statistics

```{r}
# Calculate mean and standard deviation by category
aggregate(value ~ category, data = data, FUN = function(x) {
  c(mean = mean(x), sd = sd(x), n = length(x))
})
```

## Data Table

```{r}
# Display first 10 rows
head(data, 10)
```

## Session Information

```{r}
# Full session info for debugging
sessionInfo()
```
